summary: When old feelings return, a reunion of friends at a Swedish summerhouse is thrown into chaos, hurt and conflict.
cast: Sara Blomqvist|Kalle Josephson|Ania Chorabik|Nanna Blondell|Carl Dacko|Andrea Bodelson|Arram Eckerbom|Anna Enström|Julia Frändfors|Aron Heineman|Ilja Karilampi|Anna Kulin|Tom Lloyd|Aliette Opheim
director: Directors: Johan von Reybekiel, Marcus Werner Hed
title: Sommarstället
